Uses of Game in client.ranking.db
 

Methods in client.ranking.db that return Game
 Game ScoringManager.createNewGame(java.util.ArrayList<Player> players, java.lang.String gameType)
           
 Game[] ScoringManager.showAllGamesAndLastRounds()
          select AllRound.roundId RoundId,AllRound.gameId gameid,AllRound.type type,AllRound.date date,RD.userId,U.userName,RD.point from ( select R.roundId,R.gameId, max(R.dateUpdated) date,g.gameType type from GAMES g join ROUNDS R on G.gameId=R.gameId group by R.gameId ) AllRound join RoundsDetails RD on AllRound.roundId=RD.roundId join USERS U on RD.userId=U.userId ORDER BY AllRound.date DESC
